docs.snippet: Replicating “community learning centers” has become a centerpiece of several campaigns, even as some schools in the Ohio district are still in dire academic straits....
docs.lead_paragraph: Replicating “community learning centers” has become a centerpiece of several campaigns, even as some schools in the Ohio district are still in dire academic straits.
docs.abstract: Several candidates for New York City mayor have made replication of Cincinnati's model for community schools a centerpiece of their campaigns; Cincinnati, since expanding access to health care and social services through its community schools, has made some of the greatest gains in test scores in Ohio.

headline.main: Mayoral Candidates See Cincinnati as a Model for New York Schools
headline.print_headline: Candidates for Mayor See Cincinnati as a Model for Schools in New York
